visualization_prompt: Generate a line chart showing monthly sales trends using tooltip customization and synthetic sales data
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains two time-series with 12 monthly observations each, representing synthetic sales figures for two product categories. Enterprise Solutions data (μ=144.8, σ=44.2) shows strong Q3 growth with September peak, while Consumer Products (μ=133.8, σ=35.4) demonstrates inverse seasonality. Synthetic values maintain realistic variance (±1.5σ from industry benchmarks) and opposing seasonal patterns for contrast. The line chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating chart borders and gradient effects, while dual-colored series leverage Cairo's preattentive processing for immediate pattern recognition. Annotated value formatting (k USD suffixes) and temporal x-axis organization follow Tufte's principles of contextual clarity. Tooltip customization reduces visual noise while maintaining data accessibility.
